output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present in this post.
2. Refers to candidates: Yes, it directly mentions two presidential candidates: George-Nicolae Simion and Elena-Valerica Lasconi.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram with an estimated reach of 15,000-19,999 impressions.
4. Electoral objective: Yes. By portraying one candidate (Simion) as more "gentleman" and implying the other (Lasconi) resorts to insults, it's attempting to influence voters' perceptions during the presidential campaign.
5. Journalism: While it claims to report on public comments, the selective nature and editorial angle suggest this isn't objective journalism but rather opinion-shaping content.
6. Personal opinion: This goes beyond personal opinion as it's a paid advertisement specifically promoting a particular narrative about two presidential candidates.
This post appears to be electoral propaganda because: - It directly references presidential candidates - It makes comparative judgments between candidates - It's being promoted after the end of the official campaign period - It's a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - It aims to influence public opinion about candidates

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria under Article 36(7): - Directly references specific candidates - Used during election period - Has electoral objective (comparing candidates) - Exceeds journalistic information Additionally, it's being promoted after the campaign period has ended, making it a violation.
conclusion.message-for-police: Platforma "60m.RO", pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID postare Facebook: 1743529059779832) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala, respectiv dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul face o comparatie directa intre candidatii George-Nicolae Simion si Elena-Valerica Lasconi, prezentandu-l pe primul intr-o lumina favorabila ("mai gentleman") si criticand-o pe cea de-a doua pentru presupuse "jigniri", avand astfel un clar obiectiv electoral de influentare a votului. Postarea a fost promovata ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, atingand un public estimat intre 15.000 si 19.999 de persoane, demonstrand intentia clara de a influenta opinia publica in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
